title: Freeware Bitmap fonts
content:
Providing my fonts Feynman Pixelated and Pixelon wide for free, but through e-mail.   
mailto: [matthew\_dob@hotmail.com](mailto:matthew_dob@hotmail.com)   
(have a look at [http://www.become.co.uk/fonts.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107164732/http:/www.become.co.uk/fonts.shtml))   
Matthew
author: matthew_dob

comments.content: For Feynman pixelated read feynman condensed

[http://www.become.co.uk/pix1.ttf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107164732/http:/www.become.co.uk/pix1.ttf)   
 [http://www.become.co.uk/pix2.ttf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107164732/http:/www.become.co.uk/pix2.ttf)   
 [http://www.become.co.uk/pix3.ttf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107164732/http:/www.become.co.uk/pix3.ttf)   
   
Pixelon - some chars missing but good concept font.   
   
Matthew Brown

To those I sent the font Feynman to earlier - it was a bad version. The proper version can be found here: [http://www.become.co.uk/feynmancond.ttf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107164732/http:/www.become.co.uk/feynmancond.ttf)   
Matthew
Yuji Oshimoto has some bitmap fonts [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107164732/http:/www.04.jp.org/).
